goods_model_name = #{goodsModelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update sh_goods_model set goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_model_name = #{goodsModelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bu_code = #{buCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_updated_date = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, row_id = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where goods_model_id = #{goodsModelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT t.goods_model_id,t.goods_model_name,t.price,a.zone_goods_id FROM sh_goods_model t LEFT JOIN sh_zone_goods a ON a.goods_id = t.goods_id WHERE t.goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
